business_data.title: About you
business_data.description: Tell us more about yourself and your business.

credentials.title: Account Setup
credentials.description: Enter the password for your business profile.

accept_terms.title: Your data protection
accept_terms.description: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) puts you in charge of your personal data. Please select how your data can be used.
accept_terms.warning: You have to accept the terms & conditions, before continuing

choose_categories.title: Choose your business category
choose_categories.fetch_error: Unexpected error occured while fetching data. Try again later.

work_type.title: Where Do You Work?
work_type.description: Do your clients come to you, do you go to them, or both?

stationary.name: At my place
stationary.help_text: My clients come to me. I own the place or work in a salon/suite alongside other professionals.

remotely.name: At the client's location
remotely.help_text: I'm on the go. My services are performed at the client's location.

work_type.warning: Please select at least one option to continue

find_address.title: Map Location
find_address.description: Move the map so that your location is directly under the pin.

working_hours.title: Your Business Hours
working_hours.description: When can clients book with you?

modal.description: Set your business hours here. Head to your calendar if you need to adjust hours for a single day.

add_services.title: Start Adding Services
add_services.description: Add at least one service now. Later you can add more, edit details, and group services into categories.

modal.description: You'll be able to add a description and adjust advanced settings for this service later on.

add_services.warning: Dodaj conajmniej jedną usługę, aby przejść dalej

add_employees.title: Add More Staff Members?
add_employees.description: Add basic information about your team. You'll be able to complete their profiles, assign services, and adjust working hours later on.
